sources.title: The Big Wheel
sources.description: The plot focus is on Mickey Rooney's character Bill Coy who follows in his father's footsteps for good and for bad.

sources.title: The Big Wheel (1949) Mickey Rooney | Action, Drama, Romance HD Classic Movie
sources.description:
The RACE of his LIFE could be Rooney's ROAD to RUIN! A brash young midget car race driver lives in the shadow of his famous father, a drunken womanizer, who was killed in an accident years earlier.

Director: Edward Ludwig
Writer: Robert Smith
Stars: Mickey Rooney, Thomas Mitchell, Michael O'Shea 
Genres: Classics, Cult Film, Action, Drama, Romance, Sport

CCC CHAPTERS: in the general comments, tell us your favorite scene or line in the movie, with a time stamp & we will add it here!
00:00 Full Length Movie
01:26 Too fast?
03:36 Billy Coy
05:59 A girl mechanic?
07:33 Worn out middle aged romance
11:42 Qualifying race

metadata.Plot: Billy Coy comes to Carrell. His late father's mechanic Red hires Billy as a mechanic. Soon, Billy gets a job as a driver.
metadata.Actors: Mickey Rooney, Thomas Mitchell, Michael O'Shea
